section.name: Description of the module biologicallist.js
section.p: This module contains functions to handle biological list with javascript.

section.name: Creation functions
Read functions
section.source: /* * read a biological list. * @param file File to read * @param trim trim readed entries * @return the biological list object readed */ function readBiologicalList(file, trim);

section.name: Write functions
section.source: /* * Write a biological list. * @param list List to write * @param file Write to write * @return nothing */ function writeBiologicalList(list, file);
